text: Travers is an unincorporated community in Barry County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Traverse was in operation from 1889 until 1894. The name was changed to Travers in 1898, and the post office was discontinued in 1903. The community was named after O.H. Traverse, an Illinois legislator. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Barry County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Travers, Missouri
